answers.answer: Hi,Balanitis is inflammation of the glans penis.Inflammation has many possible causes, including irritation by environmental substances, physical trauma, and infection by a wide variety of pathogens, including bacteria, virus, or fungus—each of which require a particular treatmentLack of aeration and irritation because of smegma and discharge surrounding the glans penis causes inflammation and edema.If there is an infection, treatment will include an appropriate antibiotic or antifungal medication. In cases of severe or persistent inflammation, a circumcision may be recommended.Taking appropriate hygiene measures can help prevent future bouts of balanitis, such as retracting the foreskin daily and adequately cleaning and drying the head of the penis. In addition, it is important to avoid strong soaps or chemicals, especially those known to cause a skin reaction.ref:http://www.tamilstar.com/news/health/article_4836.shtmlref:http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/BalanitisIt is completely curable but it can recur again.
